creator: purnasatyap@Gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 33794
Junk Chars

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/jmeter-dev/201604.mbox/browser

All.

I was interested in some of the new features in JMeter 3.0 , so I started
some testing with the latest build.

When I am generating a report using the jmeter -n -g <LogFileName>,

I am finding that there are some junk characters which are showing up on
the home page of the report which got generated.

Please find the screenshot attached.

There characters are not report in the report template.

creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
Hi,
Can you attach the HTML file ?
Thank you

Thanks, it's the BOM character.
I have fixed it.
Will commit later.
Regards
creator: support@ubikloadpack.com

text:
Hi,
Can you test on nightly build and confirm issue is fixed ?
Thanks
